title: Hextech Crafting
body: my friend i just got into league just reached level 5 and asked me what hextech crafting was. i told him he had 2 free chests and 2 free keys and could open the to see what happened. he didnt have the 2 chests. i am really confused and i am not sure why this happened. because my other friend got 2 chests just as he reached level 5. could someone please explain?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not sure about the "2 free chests" I know he should've received one at level 3.

Was the account already level 3+ before the hextech crafting system was implemented? if so he would've received RP instead of the first chest.

If not and he's sure he hasn't received it, please have him [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
